posts.post_content:
Below are descriptions and links to scans of these two cards.  I only desire to sell and not trade.  PM's take priority over thread replies.  If you have any questions please PM or email me at acowan19(at)gmail(dot)com.

Old Judge Fred Nyce, St Louis Whites, Holding Ball (RAW)- $200/OBO  

Card is in very good condition.  No paper loss or writing.  One corner has slight peeling of the paper on the front; all corners are soft but none rounded.   There is a surface wrinkle on the reverse.  The card is whole (no skinning).

[IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-qZTnSbn/2/L/i-qZTnSbn-L.jpg[/IMG]   [IMG]http://www.aaroncowanphotos.com/photos/i-2NjgfSn/2/L/i-2NjgfSn-L.jpg[/IMG]
